name: Nimble Bunn
description: Greetings! My name is Bunn. Welcome to my strange and beautiful world. You might find it silly that I'm constantly searching for food but it's the main thing I need to keep fit...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
